item.title: Brandon Harvey, Los Angeles, CA
item.description: strike valley studio I started Strike Valley Studio to help companies see around corners and build for the future. We do two things: Build new software in new ways Consult for companies who are adapting to the age of AI No website yet, and the paint is not yet dry. But reach out to me via LinkedIn if you have a project in mind! softmax SoftMax is an AI startup doing pioneering research into to fundamental problems in Reinforcement Learning (RL) and AI alignment.
